title: IPropertyManagerPageCheckbox.State
description: Gets or sets the state of this check box.
returns: State of this check box as defined in swPropertyManagerCheckboxState_e
remarks: If you use this property to set the state of a check box, then you must use this property to modify the state of the check box.

Set Focus on PropertyManager Page Control (VB.NET)
